channel.title: 508 bug ! IM NOT ASKING HOW TO JOINA 508 SERVER!
channel.description:
Ok i have the 508 cache/client and i can go on a 508 server ( Gods army 2.0 ) but when i run any other 508 (massimo) It doesnt let me connect it says, Connection received from:my lan ip but just says error connecting to server.
thanks in advance[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2009, 01:54:33 pm[/size][hr]The same happens when i try to connect to -
http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=stoneage.no-ip.org and http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=abadonia.servegame.com
